languages.text: {n}Голос Равора дрожит — Главный кормчий едва сдерживает ярость.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Варп бы побрал этого... Нас обокрали! Корабль лишился шаттла, и знаете, по чьей милости? Как Мастер вокса сообщила, судно было... "реквизировано" по требованию служителя Инквизиции для проведения расследования, угодного Золотому Трону!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан... у меня неприятные известия. Корабль лишился одного шаттла. Не по вине несчастного случая или диверсии". {n}Вигдис делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "Ваша собственность была реквизирована по требованию служителя Инквизиции для проведения расследования, угодного Золотому Трону".

languages.text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Равора дрожит — Главный кормчий едва сдерживает ярость.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Варп бы побрал этого... Нас обокрали! Корабль лишился шаттла, и знаете, по чьей милости? Как Мастер вокса сообщила, судно было... "реквизировано" по требованию служителя Инквизиции для проведения расследования, угодного Золотому Трону!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... I have unpleasant news. Your voidship lost one shuttle. Although it happened through no accident or sabotage." {n}Vigdis takes a deep breath.{/n} "Your property has been requisitioned at the request of a member of the Inquisition for an investigation ordered by the Golden Throne's interests."

"Lord Captain... I have unpleasant news. Your voidship lost one shuttle. Although it happened through no accident or sabotage." {n}Vigdis takes a deep breath.{/n} "Your property has been requisitioned at the request of a member of the Inquisition for an investigation ordered by the Golden Throne's interests."

{n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

{n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

{n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

languages.text: {n}舵手长雷沃的声音颤抖着，几乎无法克制他的愤怒。{/n}“船长老大！我们被抢了，真希望亚空间弄死那个狗娘养的！船上有一艘穿梭机被人开走了，你猜是谁干的？音阵大师报告说，那艘船被……被审判庭的狗腿子给‘征用’走了，以黄金王座的名义拿去调查用了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}舵手长雷沃的声音颤抖着，几乎无法克制他的愤怒。{/n}“船长老大！我们被抢了，真希望亚空间弄死那个狗娘养的！船上有一艘穿梭机被人开走了，你猜是谁干的？音阵大师报告说，那艘船被……被审判庭的狗腿子给‘征用’走了，以黄金王座的名义拿去调查用了！”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ravor tiembla, incapaz de contener su furia.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Que la disformidad se lleve a ese hijo de... ¡nos ha robado! La nave ha perdido una lanzadera, y ¿quién es el responsable? Como ha informado la maestra de vocos, el transporte ha sido... "confiscado" por el sirviente de la Inquisición para llevar a cabo una investigación para los intereses del Trono Dorado».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ravor tiembla, incapaz de contener su furia.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Que la disformidad se lleve a ese hijo de... ¡nos ha robado! La nave ha perdido una lanzadera, y ¿quién es el responsable? Como ha informado la maestra de vocos, el transporte ha sido... "confiscado" por el sirviente de la Inquisición para llevar a cabo una investigación para los intereses del Trono Dorado».

languages.text: {n}Ravors Stimme zittert – der Hauptsteuermann kann seine Wut nur mit Mühe zügeln.{/n} "Lord Captain! Der Warp soll diesen verdammten ... wir wurden bestohlen! Das Raumschiff hat ein Shuttle verloren und wisst Ihr, wem wir das zu verdanken haben? Laut der Voxmeisterin wurde der Lander vom Diener der Inquisition ... 'requiriert', um zum Wohle des Goldenen Throns eine Untersuchung durchzuführen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

languages.text: {n}La voix de Ravor tremble tant le maître timonier semble avoir du mal à contenir sa colère.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Que le Warp engloutisse ce fils de... on a été victimes d'un vol ! Le vaisseau a perdu une navette et vous savez qui est responsable ? Comme le signalait la maîtresse-vox, la navette a été... "réquisitionnée" par le serviteur de l'Inquisition afin de mener une enquête pour le compte du Trône d'Or ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Ravor tremble tant le maître timonier semble avoir du mal à contenir sa colère.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Que le Warp engloutisse ce fils de... on a été victimes d'un vol ! Le vaisseau a perdu une navette et vous savez qui est responsable ? Comme le signalait la maîtresse-vox, la navette a été... "réquisitionnée" par le serviteur de l'Inquisition afin de mener une enquête pour le compte du Trône d'Or ! »

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアの声は震えている…マスター・ヘルムスマンは、全く怒りを抑えられない様子だ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！歪みに飲まれ…盗まれてしまいました！ヴォイドシップはシャトルを1機失いました。誰のせいだと思いますか？ヴォクス・マスターの報告通り、あのシャトルは…黄金の玉座の利益のために調査を行う異端審問庁の従者に『強制的に駆り出された』のです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアの声は震えている…マスター・ヘルムスマンは、全く怒りを抑えられない様子だ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！歪みに飲まれ…盗まれてしまいました！ヴォイドシップはシャトルを1機失いました。誰のせいだと思いますか？ヴォクス・マスターの報告通り、あのシャトルは…黄金の玉座の利益のために調査を行う異端審問庁の従者に『強制的に駆り出された』のです！」

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un sesi titriyor. Belli ki Başserdümen, öfkesine zorlukla hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Hay canını uçsuz alasıca... Soyulduk! Uçsuz gemimiz bir mekik kaybetti. Bilin bakalım kimin işi? Voks Üstadı'nın ilettiği üzere mekiğe... Altın Taht'ın menfaati için yürütülecek bir soruşturmada kullanılması amacıyla 'el konulmuş'!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's voice trembles — the Master Helmsman can barely restrain his rage.{/n} "Lord Captain! Warp take that son of a— we have been robbed! The voidship has lost one shuttle, and know who we have to thank for it? As the Vox Master reported, the lander has been... 'requisitioned' by the servant of the Inquisition to conduct an investigation in the interests of the Golden Throne!"
